articles.title: Jurgen Klopp answers Jude Bellingham question and makes admission over surprise exit - The Mirror
articles.description: The Liverpool boss issued updates on both the Reds pursuit of Jude Bellingham and how the club will fare in the upcoming January transfer window in light of Julian Ward's impending exit
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp appeared to laugh off the idea of Liverpool landing Jude Bellingham's signature in the upcoming January transfer window but did claim the Reds are "prepared" for next month.
